document.full_text: aerosmith rocker steven tyler says he signed on as a judge of "american idol," a show he had never watched, to defy his estranged bandmates.
document.title: tyler joined "idol" to prove point to bandmates
lines_and_colors: aerosmith rocker steven tyler says he signed on as a judge of "american idol," a show he had never watched, to defy his estranged bandmates.
